com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller

Class DBMerchantController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller.DBMerchantController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/merchants")
public class DBMerchantController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Merchant class, the API of which is available at /merchants.

      • getMerchants

        @Cacheable(value="Merchants")
 @GetMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Merchant> getMerchants(@RequestParam(value="merchantName",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String merchantName)
        Gets the merchants with the associated name if provided.
        Parameters:
        merchantName - The name of a merchant
        Returns:
        A list of merchants, with the given name if provided

      • getMerchantByID

 @GetMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Merchant getMerchantByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                          java.lang.Long merchantID)
        Get the Merchant with the given ID if it exists.
        Parameters:
        merchantID - The ID of a merchant
        Returns:
        The Merchant with the given ID, or null if it does not exist

      • saveMerchant

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Merchant","Merchants"},
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public Merchant saveMerchant(@RequestParam(value="merchantName")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String merchantName)
        Creates a new merchant with the given merchant name.
        Parameters:
        merchantName - The merchant name associated with where the SYL Link landed
        Returns:
        The newly created merchant

      • saveMerchantByID

        @CachePut(cacheNames="Merchant",
          key="#merchantID")
 @CacheEvict(cacheNames="Merchants",
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Merchant saveMerchantByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long merchantID,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="merchantName")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String merchantName)
        Updates a merchant of the given ID with the given merchant name if it exists.
        Parameters:
        merchantID - The ID of a merchant
        merchantName - The new name of a merchant
        Returns:
        The updated merchant, or null if the original did not exist

      • deleteMerchant

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Click","Clicks","Link","Links","Merchant","Merchants"},
            allEntries=true)
 @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public void deleteMerchant(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.Long merchantID)
        Deletes a merchant and all of its associated clicks and links.
        Parameters:
        merchantID - The ID of an associated merchant
